channel.title: Events on DASH Industry Forum
channel.description: Recent content in Events on DASH Industry Forum

item.title: Summary
item.description: DASH-IF runs, organizes and sponsors different events: DASH-IF Social Events at IBC and NAB DASH-IF face-to-face member meetings DASH-IF organized workshops DASH-IF supported events (conferences, symposia) DASH-IF Special Sessions (Online Events) If you are interested in organizing an event, please contact DASH-IF.

item.title: Social Events
item.description: Here is a list of DASH-IF Social Events over last years. You will also find the sponsors of the events. September 11, 2022: DASH-IF at IBC 2022 September 15, 2019: DASH-IF at IBC 2019 April 10, 2019: DASH-IF at NAB 2019 September 16, 2018: DASH-IF at IBC 2018 April 11, 2018: DASH-IF at NAB 2018 September 17, 2017: DASH-IF at IBC 2017 together with VR-IF April 26, 2017: DASH-IF at NAB 2017 September 11, 2016: DASH-IF at IBC 2016 April 20, 2016: DASH-IF at NAB 2016 together with UltraHD Forum September 14, 2014: DASH-IF at IBC 2014 September 13, 2013: DASH-IF at IBC 2013

item.title: Member Meetings (face-to-face)
item.description: Upcoming Meetings June 15-16, 2023 - Berlin, Germany: DASH-IF #23 together with Fraunhofer Fokus - Media Web Symposium History of DASH-IF f2f meetings since 2012. item.title: Special Sessions
item.description: Introduction In early 2020, when the pandemic just was kicking off, DASH-IF replaced its f2f meetings with a series of Special Sessions. This was setup in order to provide a platform for DASH-IF members and external companies to present new ideas. DASH-IF typically invites colleagues from other organizations such as MPEG, 3GPP, DVB, SCTE, CTA WAVE or ATSC. This makes these presentations lively and interesting and we have identified relevant new topics for which some of them have been moved into work streams.
